cu.explanation_en: Setting drb_ciphering to an invalid value 'maybe' will cause security configuration errors during initialization.

du.explanation_en: Setting drb_ciphering to an invalid value 'maybe' will cause security configuration errors during initialization.
du.explanation_zh: 將 drb_ciphering 設定為無效值 'maybe' 會在初始化期間導致安全配置錯誤。
